title: Phone Interaction
description: Captures information in the context of a phone call conversation

ID.title: ID of the call conversation
ID.description: A unique identifier to represent the phone call conversation

fromWhoID.title: Initiator of the call
fromWhoID.description: Person ID who initiated the call of the conversation

toWhoID.title: Call reciever
toWhoID.description: Person ID who recieved the call

disposition.title: Label the outcome of the phone call
disposition.description: The outcome of the call as next triggering actions such as 'demo scheduled','left voicemail', etc.

duration.title: Time Spent during the call
duration.description: Record the length of the phone conversation in seconds

type.title: Type of the phone call
type.description: A way to represent the nature of the call

fromNumber.title: Phone Number of the initiator of the call
fromNumber.description: Person's phone number who initiated the conversation. Note the phone number is a string and may include meaningful characters such as brackets '()', hyphens '-', or characters to indicate sub-dialing identifiers like extensions 'x' for example,  1-353(0)18391111 or +613 9403600x1234.

toNumber.title: Phone number of the call reciever
toNumber.description: Person's phone number who is the reciever of the call. Note the phone number is a string and may include meaningful characters such as brackets '()', hyphens '-', or characters to indicate sub-dialing identifiers like extensions 'x' for example,  1-353(0)18391111 or +613 9403600x1234.

hasLeftVoiceMail.title: Has the initiator of the call left any Voice Mail message
hasLeftVoiceMail.description: A boolean flag to represent whether a voice mail has been left for the reciever
